text: Pleurobranchaea meckeli is a species of sea slug, specifically a side gill slug or notaspideans. It is a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Pleurobranchaeidae. ==Description== The length of the body attains 150 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Mediterranean Sea and in the North Atlantic Ocean off Cape Verde and Portugal. ==References== == External links == * Category:Pleurobranchaeidae Category:Gastropods described in 1813 Category:Molluscs of the Atlantic Ocean Category:Molluscs of the Mediterranean Sea Category:Molluscs of Europe Category:Gastropods of Cape Verde
title: Pleurobranchaea meckeli
